name: Wolof Music
description: Music of the Wolof people of Senegal and The Gambia comprising a wide variety of West African Music traditions influenced by nearby cultures.

children.name: Mbalax
children.description: Rooted in njuup, a Serer ritual tradition incorporating influences from Cuban, Congolese, and American popular music.

children.name: Tassu
children.description: Rhythmic poetry that has been a part of Senegalese culture since ancient times.
